head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FOSTER, PETER VINCENT

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FOSTER, PETER VINCENT

block.p: FOSTER-Peter Vincent, 62. Ipswich, MA & Jackson, NH suddenly Sept. 16, 2000. Yale Graduate 1960. A memorial service will be Sunday, Sept. 24 at noon at the New Highland Cemetery in Ipswich. A Separate service will be Saturday, Oct. 14, in Jackson, NH. Contributions may be made to either: S.A.F.E. Studio, 2 Essex Rd., Ipswich, MA. 01938 or to Tin Mountain Conservation Foundation, P.O. Box 1170 Conway, NH 03818. For information Morris Funeral Home of Ipswich.
